name: Ornate Kabuto
description:
After another character of yours uses an Elemental Burst: The character to which this is attached gains 1 Energy.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After another character of yours uses an Elemental Burst: </color>The character to which this is attached gains 1 $[K310].\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After another character of yours uses an Elemental Burst: </color>The character to which this is attached gains 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color>.\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
storytext: "Thirteen years went by like a dream. The scarlet snow flies through the shadowed pass like smoke. You have now gone afar."
